exception.message:
An error "{{errorName}}" occurred while processing events for the room {{roomId}} {{roomName}}.
Please provide this number: [{{requestId}}] for further questions.

commandErrors.generic: There was an error processing your command: {{message}}
commandErrors.noLanguageCode: Language code is not provided, use one of these ({{availableLanguageCodes}})

commandHelp: • !meeting lang <en|de> (Change the language of the bot in this room.)
• !meeting setup (Adds the calendar to the room.)
• !meeting status (Checks the ability to add the calendar.)

invite.messageByOrganizer_present: you've been invited to a meeting by {{organizerDisplayName}}

occurrence.deleted: A single meeting from a meeting series on {{range, daterange}} is deleted

ruleText.yearly_bymonthday_other: Every {{count}} years on the $t(recurrenceEditor.ruleText.ordinal, {"count": {{bymonthday}}, "ordinal": true }) of {{monthLabel}}$t(recurrenceEditor.ruleText.recurrenceEnd, {"context": "{{recurrenceEnd}}" })

welcome.botIsAdmin: The bot is a moderator in the room {{originalRoomName}}. If you enter the command !meeting setup NeoDateFix widget will be added to that room.
welcome.botNotAdmin: The bot is not a moderator in the room {{originalRoomName}}.

errors.meetingWidgetExists: Can't add a new widget because it already exists.
errors.notEnoughPermissions: Unfortunately, I cannot add the calendar function. I don't have the right authorisation. Please give me moderator rights in your room {{originalRoomName}}.

welcome.helpWhenNotAdmin: Unfortunately, I cannot add the calendar function. I don't have the right authorisation. Please give me moderator rights in your room {{originalRoomName}}.
intro: Hello {{userDisplayName}}, thank you for inviting me to the {{originalRoomName}}.
I would be happy to help you set up your calendar in that room.

In order for me to add the calendar function to your room, please give me the necessary right to add widgets to the room {{originalRoomName}} (The Moderator role for example). You can do so in my user profile that you can find in the right side menu via the "info"-icon.
If you do not want to give me the necessary permissions, you can add the calendar function to your room manually by sending the following Message into the room: /addwidget {{widgetURL}}
To get an overview of all commands you can send !meeting help
introDone: Hello {{userDisplayName}}, thank you for inviting me to the {{originalRoomName}}.
My job was to help you set up the calendar.
The calendar has now been successfully set up in your room. Therefore, you can now leave this chat.
To get an overview of all commands you can send !meeting help
introLanguage: Information on the language setting: To enable communication in your language, you can use the following commands:
welcome.meetingWidgetAdded:
My job is done.

The calendar is already successfully installed into your room. You can leave this private chat-room.

privateRoom.inviteReason: In this private room bot can help with adding a NeoDateFix widget to the room '{{originalRoomName}}'.
privateRoom.name: Help for {{originalRoomName}}
privateRoom.topic: How to use this bot to setup the widget bot in the room {{originalRoomName}}.
